prompt: necesito que me des un juguete de ambos personajes

structured_prompt.short_description: A pair of stylized plush toys, one representing a character with light blue hair and blue eyes, and the other a character with spiky red hair and dark eyes. They are designed in a chibi or super deformed style, emphasizing cuteness and softness, and are positioned side-by-side on a clean, minimalist surface, suggesting they are collectibles or merchandise.

objects.description: A plush toy designed in a chibi style, featuring light blue hair, large blue eyes with a lightning bolt detail, and a small, slightly open mouth. It has a soft, rounded body.
objects.relationship: positioned next to the red-haired plush toy, facing forward
objects.appearance_details: embroidered facial features, small white details on hair
objects.clothing: simple dark blue top, part of the plush design

objects.description: A plush toy designed in a chibi style, featuring spiky red hair, dark eyes with a sharp, intense gaze, and distinct black markings on its face. It has a soft, rounded body.
objects.relationship: positioned next to the blue-haired plush toy, facing forward
objects.appearance_details: embroidered facial features, black markings on face, small red detail under eye
objects.clothing: simple dark top, part of the plush design

lighting.shadows: subtle, soft shadows directly beneath the plush toys, indicating their placement on the surface

aesthetics.composition: centered, symmetrical arrangement of two objects

photographic_characteristics.focus: sharp focus on both plush toys

structured_prompt.context: This is a concept for product photography of collectible plush toys, intended for an online store or merchandise catalog.
